name: Jig Jag Jog
description:
Join Justin, Olive, and Squidgy through this new game inspired by their adventures on Justin Time. Intuitive controls and addictive gameplay will provide hours of entertainment to your child.

Froggy Bog - Take Justin on a boat ride through the bayou!

Yukon Gold - Hang tight with Justin and Squidgy for a thrilling ride through the gold mine, collecting gold nuggets along the way!

Ready Set Zoom - Use your skills to help Justin win the big race!

Take the Justin Time adventures with you!

Features:
- 3 unique game levels, catered to the pre-school audience.
- Beautiful artwork and environments based on the hit TV show Justin Time
- Fun and exciting suprises to discover
- Easy to learn controls

Requires iPad 2 or later.
